reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Voluntary medical cardiac catheterization campaign for adults in Niger

description.narrative: 1. Carry out catheters for adults with low-income families who cannot cover the costs of treatment in Nigerian hospitals. 2. Providing patients with medication needs for the operation. 3. Eliminate the suffering of many adults with heart disease. 4. Health education for everyone receiving treatment. 5. Aid to the Ministry of Health, which suffers from a shortage of cardiologists.
Carry out adult catheters Providing medical tools to the hospital and volunteer doctors Providing medicines to needy patients

participating-org.narrative: International Organization for Relief, Welfare & Development
King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
